org.hibernate.search.indexes.serialization.impl

Class LuceneWorkSerializerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.indexes.serialization.impl.LuceneWorkSerializerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, Startable, Stoppable, LuceneWorkSerializer

    public class LuceneWorkSerializerImpl
extends Object
implements LuceneWorkSerializer, Startable, Stoppable
    Serializes List<LuceneWork> instances back and forth using a pluggable SerializerProvider. This class controls the overall traversal process and delegates true serialization work to the SerializerProvider.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard <emmanuel@hibernate.org>, Hardy Ferentschik
